title: Breakingviews TV: Boeing/Brazil
text:
Breakingviews TV: Boeing/Brazil 5:40pm GMT - 03:40 
Tom Buerkle and Richard Beales discuss Boeing’s idea of owning up to 90 percent of Brazil-based Embraer’s commercial aircraft business, as reported locally, and what it means for the aerospace giant’s rivalry with Airbus. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Tom Buerkle and Richard Beales discuss Boeing’s idea of owning up to 90 percent of Brazil-based Embraer’s commercial aircraft business, as reported locally, and what it means for the aerospace giant’s rivalry with Airbus.
